title: IMF delegation to arrive in Sri Lanka today
byline: A delegation from the International Monetary Fund (IMF) is scheduled to arrive in the country today (22).

title: All stakeholders must unite to protect and rebuild the central hills
byline: Functioning of institutions responsible for construction and land management, agriculture, livestock and environmental conservation without proper coordination has posed challenges in restoring the central hills, which were devastated by Cyclone Ditwah, President Anura Kumara Dissanayake stated.

title: Donald Trump drops 10% tariff threat over Greenland, rules out use of force
byline: US President Donald Trump on Wednesday retracted a threat to impose a 10 percent tariff on goods from eight European countries, starting in February, for opposing his push to take control of Greenland from Denmark.

title: Mainly dry weather in most parts of the island today
byline: The prevailing dry weather conditions are expected to change from tomorrow (23).

title: PM reaffirms Sri Lanka’s commitment to feminist and intersectional leadership
byline: Prime Minister Dr. Harini Amarasuriya has reaffirmed Sri Lanka’s commitment to feminist, intersectional leadership and called on global actors to ensure that women and marginalised communities are not only participants, but principal architects of the policies shaping the future global order.
